sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou 瘺 , fistula, initially developing as swelling in the neck. Later on this moves to the broken bowl region (supraclavicular foss

a) where it opens to fester, and also it moves upward to link up with the ears. They ache and release pus. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 66: 治狼瘺發於頸耳，疼痛出膿水，空青散方 , “For treating wolf fistula developing at the neck and the ears, which ache and release pus, [use] the recipe for the powder with kong qing ”.
